Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review progress from the entire week. Focus: Documentation Review and Refinement.

Review the documentation for the core game mechanics, including movement, combat, and interactions. Ensure the documentation is clear, concise, and easy to understand. Update the documentation to reflect any changes or improvements made during the week.

Review the documentation for the physics engine integration. Ensure the documentation is comprehensive and includes all the necessary details for other programmers to understand and work with the system.
Consolidate all the documentation into a single, organized document. Create a table of contents and index to make it easier to navigate.
Share the documentation with other programmers ( @CDEV-1, @CDEV-2, @CDEV-3, @SDEV-1 ) and solicit feedback. Incorporate the feedback into the documentation to improve its clarity and accuracy.
Conduct a final review of the documentation to ensure it is complete and accurate. Address any remaining issues or concerns.
Finalize the documentation and prepare it for distribution. Create a PDF version of the document and upload it to the project repository.
Back up code, check for potential bugs, write weekly report and send to team members. Leave work.
